title: Flash Back: ACMI Collections Mash-up White Night 2017

abstract: An archival mashup of films & footage from the '40s to the '80s celebrating the youth identity and culture.
description: ‘Flash Back’, an archival mashup of films and footage from the 1940s through to the '80s celebrating the changing face of Australian youth identity and culture.  From rebel youth of the '50s, to the '70s counter culture revolution and the punk attitudes of the '80s, ‘Flash Back’ explores the changing decades through diverse subcultures and the music, fashions and cultural preoccupations that shaped them.  Image: 'Sharpies: A Gathering', courtesy Greg Macainsh  Our sincere thanks to filmmakers, musicians and donors for material used in this work. Full details in credits. Edited by ACMI's Sam Mapplebeck.
